org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.plot

Class RuntimePlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.plot.RuntimePlotter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ExperimentObserver, Plotter

    public class RuntimePlotter
extends Object
implements Plotter, ExperimentObserver
    Helper class to create plots every n episodes/steps

        plotter - The plotter to delegate to
        mode - The plotting mode (e.g. every $interval steps, every $interval episodes ... )

    • Method Detail

      • plot

        public void plot()
        Will be called every n episodes/steps depending on configuration. Turns off the adaption rule of the network when a network is given in order to avoid changes to the network due to plotting.
        Specified by:
        plot in interface Plotter

      • update

        public void update(State s,
                   Action a,
                   State sn,
                   Action an,
                   double r,
                   boolean terminalState)
        This method will be called in every step of the experiment
        Specified by:
        update in interface ExperimentObserver
        Parameters:
        s - State at time t
        a - Action at time t
        sn - State at time t+1
        an - Action at time t+1
        r - Reward for doing action a in state s
        terminalState - True if sn is a terminal state
